wikipedia_page.main: Cyril Charles Simpson (19 April 1874 in Erpingham, Norfolk, England – 5 June 1953 in Hove, Sussex) was an English cricketer. He played one first-class match for Northamptonshire against Essex in 1908. He later played three matches for the Straits Settlements against the Federated Malay States between 1919 and 1922.
